14.content:
You're in the middle of sleeping when suddenly, you start dreaming of being in a white space, floating in place and not able to move. A glowing yellow orb floats toward you and you hear a voice that sounds like it has many different voices, as if many different people are talking at once yet strangely, all of them are clear to hear.

"When you wake up you will be able to live out your fantasies... the fantasies of being shrunk around your pets, and you're unable to be hurt. This is your time to fulfill your desires," the yellow orb says, filling you with excitement. You indeed had a fantasy of being shrunk around your pets, and you have a large diversity of them too! The part about being unable to be hurt also makes you excited, you could be more on the edge without worrying about being squashed like a grape, a grape filled with organs and blood.

You suddenly wake up and see you're in a different place then you remember... You're surrounded by a cotton roof and cotton walls, before you remember your dream and realise where you are... you're under your blanket, but shrunk! The dream was real, you could finally fulfill your fantasies!

You see that you're about 4 Inches tall, about the height of a middle finger on a normal sized person. It's a decent height, one that makes you small enough to go undetected, but not too small as to be unable to travel or do anything. You crawl out from under your blanket and reach the opening where your pillow was. You climb on the pillow and look around your room, seeing the many pets in your room that you could have some fun with. Of course, you could also leave your room to find your cats or dogs walking around.

Laying in bed bored one night. You really don’t want to go to school or deal with this humdrum life any more. Looking out your window you see a shooting star and make a wish.

“I wish I was tiny and not able to change back. I want to be free to be free to try anything. I also want to also see lots of animals.” You made your 3 wishes and drifted off to sleep.

A breeze blew over your body, making you shiver in your sleep. Reaching behind you you grab for your blanket to cover yourself, but the texture is wrong. It’s rough and papery instead of soft and plush. Cracking your eyes open you turn to look thinking you grabbed on of your home work sheets instead. Looking at the paper your grasping, you bolt up and rub your eyes, thinking you seeing things. The green color is intense and the veins running thought the paper are defined so you know your not seeing things. Instead of your blanket and bed, you’re laying on a pile of gigantic leaves. Another breeze brings with the smells and sounds of nature.

Standing you look around at the trees, grass, leaves, sticks, rocks and dirt surrounding you and grin. Your out in a forest and by the size of the objects you’ve been shrunk to 1/4 of an inch tall. The grass moves and sways with the breeze, the leaves rustle in the trees, and the sounds of animals waking up can be heard. Birds flying around, insects buzzing, and other animals moving around complete the picture. Your wishes have come true. A shadow looms over you and you turn to see an animal has spotted you and is coming your way. The closer it gets you see it’s...
15.title: A forest

info.brief_description: You shrink to 1/4 inch tall, around animals, one of your fantasies!
info.description:
You are shrunk down to 1/4 inch tall in a zoo, farm, beach, your house, and anywhere else around animals.

You are Ben, a 13 year old kid with a macrophillia to animals. In this story, you enjoy the sensation of being tiny and do not want to change back.

The rules are:

Good descriptive paragraphs, no bad grammar.

Try not to kill Ben, unless it digestion or whatever but please try.

No anthro

Only animals. No interaction with humans.

I will allow anything. Vore, sexual stuff and whatever crap you want.

The main character enjoys this, so no chapters about him hating being shrunk.

Have fun!
